limits.initialText: Do you want to track your activity, loss limits or limit deposits? Your account can be set with all limits. It'll help you to get an overview of your gambling. All restriction takes effect instantly.

depositLimit.name: Deposit limits
depositLimit.text: Your account can be set with deposit limits. This setting limits  the amount you can deposit per day, week or month.
depositLimit.editRules: You can reduce your limit at any time, this change will take effect immediately. You can increase the limit, however, in order for this change to take effect, you need 24 hours.
depositLimit.deleteRules: Cancellation of the loss limit takes 24 hours. After the limit is exceeded, you will receive an email notification.

wagerLimit.name: Wager limits
wagerLimit.text: Your account can be set with wager limits. This setting controls the amount of money you can wager per day, week or month.
wagerLimit.editRules: You can reduce your limit at any time, this change will take effect immediately. You can increase the limit, however, in order for this change to take effect, you need 24 hours.
wagerLimit.deleteRules: Cancellation of the wager limit takes 24 hours. After the limit is exceeded, you will receive an email notification.

lossLimit.name: Loss limits
lossLimit.text: Your account can be set with loss limits. This setting limits the amount you can lose per day, week or month.
lossLimit.editRules: You can reduce your limit at any time, this change will take effect immediately. You can increase the limit, however, in order for this change to take effect, you need 24 hours.
lossLimit.deleteRules: Cancellation of the loss limit takes 24 hours. After the limit is exceeded, you will receive an email notification.

sessionLimit.name: Session limits
sessionLimit.title: time spent gambling
sessionLimit.text: The restriction takes effect instantly. If you hit the limit, you will be automatically logged out of your  account.

coolingOffLimit.name: Cooling off
coolingOffLimit.title: time spent gambling
coolingOffLimit.text: Feel the need to stay away from the casino for some time? You can set a cooling-off limit for a certain period of time. The restriction takes effect instantly. You won’t be able to make deposits and play during the specified period, also you will be excluded from all advertising offers. After the set period expires, you’ll receive a notification email saying your account is active again.
coolingOffLimit.editRules: Limit decrease will be applied in 24 hours after player's request. Limit increase will be applied immediately.
coolingOffLimit.deleteRules: Limit cancellation will be applied in 24 hours after player's request.

Try your luck to win a cash prize of €2,500,000 in total!

playsonMay.name: Playson May CashDays
playsonMay.text:
Welcome another month and another CashDays 60k tournamentby the well-known provider.

The prize pool of 60,000 EUR is waiting for their winners.

mayMadness.title:
May
madness
by spinomenal
mayMadness.name: May madness by spinomenal
mayMadness.text:
Again the well-known Spinomenal will drive you nuts with the exciting May Madness tournament. During the three weeks in May, you can enjoy its cool slots and tear a piece of the lavish prize pool of 60,000 EUR!

Let’s start with Round II! It runs between May 18, 2021, 00:00 GMT, and May 24, 2021, 23:59 GMT.

dropsWins.text:
The main tournament of the year! Join Stage 4 (Weeks 13-16) of the promotion. Try your luck to win a cash prize of €2,500,000 in total! There are weekly and daily tournaments with generous prize pools.
Every day you can get prizes in various popular slots from well-known Pragmatic Play™.
dropsWins.textMobile: Welcome new Drops & Wins Network Promotion! Try your luck to win a cash prize of € 2 500 000 in total!

terms.title: Stage 4 runs between
terms.text:
Week 13: 6th May 2021 00:01 CEST – 12th May 2021 23:59 CEST
Week 14: 13th May 2021 00:01 CEST – 19th May 2021 23:59 CEST
Week 15: 20th May 2021 00:01 CEST – 26th May 2021 23:59 CEST
Week 16: 27th May 2021 00:01 CEST – 2nd June 2021 23:59 CEST

terms.title: Games in this tournament
terms.text: Wolf Gold™, Mustang Gold™, Sweet Bonanza™, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen™, Great Rhino Megaways™, John Hunter and the Book of Tut™, The Dog House™, The Dog House Megaways™, Joker's Jewels™, Chilli Heat™, Fruit Party™, Big Bass Bonanza™, Madame Destiny Megaways™, Gems Bonanza™, Wild Wild Riches™, The Hand of Midas™, Wild West Gold™, Gates of Olympus™, Congo Cash™, Fishin' Reels™, Power of Thor Megaways™, Floating Dragon™, Wild Booster™, Hot Fiesta™, Buffalo King Megaways™.

terms.title: Drops & Wins includes
terms.text:
Each Tournament runs for seven days from Thursday to Wednesday with daily Prize Drops in parallel. The maximum WEEKLY prize pool of €31,000 in total will be shared between 550 winners.
Players have an opportunity to win cash prizes in Daily prize drops with the €4,500 prize pool which will be shared between 20 of the most active participants.

terms.title: How to win
terms.text: A player must place a real money bet on any of the participating games and must get at least one (1) in-game win to qualify for the Weekly Tournament. No minimum real money bet is required for players to be eligible to participate in the Daily Prize Drops (Prize Multiplier Weeks).

terms.title: Additionally
terms.text:
Players participating during multiplier weeks may win prizes in the form of a multiplier of the winning player’s bet amount as set out in the Weekly Tournament (Prize Multiplier Weeks) Prize Table – and the Daily Prize Drop (Prize Multiplier Weeks) Prize Table further below (hereinafter the “Prize Multiplier Weeks”)
If the winning spin exceeds ten Euros (€ 10), the prize will be paid out based on a bet of ten Euros (€ 10) or the equivalent amount in the Available Currency (as defined further below) X multiplier received.
The leaderboard is ranked in accordance with the score, which score is based on the highest single spin win amount on any participating game adjusted to the amount of the bet.
In the event of two (2) or more players finishing a Weekly Tournament on the same leaderboard position, the player who has achieved the score first will receive the higher prize.

playsonMay.text:
Welcome another month and another CashDays 60k tournamentby the well-known provider. Playson knows how to treat its beloved players. The prize pool of 60,000 EUR is waiting for their winners.
The tournament runs between 0:01 UTC on the 1st of May 2021 and 8th of May 2021 until 23:59 UTC.
playsonMay.textMobile: Welcome another month and another CashDays 60k tournamentby the well-known provider.

terms.text: The tournament runs between 0:01 UTC on the 1st of May 2021 and 8th of May 2021 until 23:59 UTC.

There are 10 participating games:
● Book of Gold: Double Chance
● Book of Gold: Multichance
● Buffalo Power: Hold and Win
● Burning Wins: classic 5 lines
● Diamond Wins: Hold and Win
● Divine Dragon: Hold and Win
● Legend of Cleopatra MegawaysTM
● Solar Queen
● Solar Temple
● Wolf Power: Hold and Win
Points are calculated round-by-round, with each 1 EUR (or currency equivalent) won equaling 10 points.
The minimum bet required to qualify is 0.50 EUR.
The munificent prize pool of 60,000 EUR will be shared between 350 lucky players.
The more points you earn, the higher your chances of winning are.

mayMadness.text:
Again the well-known Spinomenal will drive you nuts with the exciting May Madness tournament. During the three weeks in May, you can enjoy its cool slots and tear a piece of the lavish prize pool of 60,000 EUR!

Let’s start with Round II! It runs between May 18, 2021, 00:00 GMT, and May 24, 2021, 23:59 GMT.
mayMadness.textMobile: Again the well-known Spinomenal will drive you nuts with the exciting May Madness tournament. During the three weeks in May, you can enjoy its cool slots and tear a piece of the lavish prize pool of 60,000 EUR!

terms.text: Round II runs between between May 18, 2021, 00:00 GMT, and May 24, 2021, 23:59 GMT.

Participating games in Round II:

● Queen Of Fire
● Egyptian Rebirth II
● Magical Amazon
The minimum qualifying bet per spin to participate in the tournament is 0.5 EUR.
Each win rewards you with a score based on the win multiplier. The more points you collect, the higher your position on the leaderboard.
